allow: Bash(python -c "import soundfile as sf; print(''=== sorce-audio.wav ===''); info=sf.info(''/e/Projects/seed-vc/assets/sorce-audio.wav''); print(f''格式: {info.format}''); print(f''子格式: {info.subtype}''); print(f''采样率: {info.samplerate}Hz''); print(f''通道数: {info.channels}''); print(f''帧数: {info.frames}''); print(''=== targets.wav ===''); info=sf.info(''/e/Projects/seed-vc/assets/targets.wav''); print(f''格式: {info.format}''); print(f''子格式: {info.subtype}''); print(f''采样率: {info.samplerate}Hz''); print(f''通道数: {info.channels}''); print(f''帧数: {info.frames}'')")
